AI Supports Trading
Extension supports users to optimize Futures trading!

Currently, we are developing supported features on the MEXC exchange with the following functions:
1. Introduction to extended functions
- Margin customers have 2 options: Isolated and Cross
- Automatic order entry has 2 modes: Fomo and Safe
- There are 2 options for opening and closing a channel: Open an order and actively close the order or Only actively close the order but do not automatically open the order.
- Leverage: Depending on the adjustment level according to the features of the trading platform
- Volume, also known as trading vol after leverage
- Tp: % fluctuation to take profit
- SL: % change to cut losses
- Scan time: Time the system checks to perform the next transaction.
2. Development plan
- Functions are being upgraded and developed every day
- Plan to cooperate with major exchanges in the near future
